languages.text: "Мы не позволим этим тварям поднять голову. Мои люди уже на пути в крипту, будем ждать вас там".
"We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."
languages.original_text: "Мы не позволим этим тварям поднять голову. Мои люди уже на пути в крипту, будем ждать вас там".

traits.locale_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."
"We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."
"We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

"We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

languages.text: 「あのクズどもが許されない。我の者たちはすでに地下室へ向かっている。そこで待っております」
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: 「あのクズどもが許されない。我の者たちはすでに地下室へ向かっている。そこで待っております」

languages.text: «No dejaremos que esa chusma levante cabeza. Mi gente ya se dirige a la cripta. Le esperaremos allí».
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: «No dejaremos que esa chusma levante cabeza. Mi gente ya se dirige a la cripta. Le esperaremos allí».

languages.text: « Nous ne laisserons pas cette vermine montrer sa vilaine tête. Mon équipe est déjà en route vers la crypte. Nous vous y attendrons. »
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne laisserons pas cette vermine montrer sa vilaine tête. Mon équipe est déjà en route vers la crypte. Nous vous y attendrons. »

languages.text: “我们绝不会给那些人渣喘息的机会。我的手下目前正在赶往地下墓穴，我们会在那里等待您的到来。”
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: “我们绝不会给那些人渣喘息的机会。我的手下目前正在赶往地下墓穴，我们会在那里等待您的到来。”

languages.text: "Wir lassen nicht zu, dass dieses Gesindel seine hässliche Fratze zeigt. Meine Leute sind schon unterwegs zur Krypta. Wir werden dort auf Euch warten."
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: "Wir lassen nicht zu, dass dieses Gesindel seine hässliche Fratze zeigt. Meine Leute sind schon unterwegs zur Krypta. Wir werden dort auf Euch warten."

languages.text: "O itin, iğrenç kafasını bir daha kaldırmasına izin vermeyeceğiz. Adamlarım çoktan mahzene doğru yola çıktı. Orada görüşürüz."
languages.original_text: "We won't let that scum rear their ugly heads. My people are already on their way to the crypt. We'll be waiting for you there."

traits.locale_text: "O itin, iğrenç kafasını bir daha kaldırmasına izin vermeyeceğiz. Adamlarım çoktan mahzene doğru yola çıktı. Orada görüşürüz."
